page.title: 17HOME LIFE 1
page.content: My alarm clock wakes me in the morning and I go downstairs to make my breakfast of toast and jam. Then I make my bed and put my nightclothes away. After I wash and clean my teeth I get dressed and make breakfast and a cup of tea for my mum. Then I put on my coat and shoes and go to school on my own. As soon as I reach school I usually get my maths book out or sometimes I get my reading book out and sit in the quiet area until my teacher takes the register. After the register our teacher tells us what work we are doing. On Monday we start with Language, after which we do Maths or our Topic on Frogs. At l0.30 we have our milk and a biscuit and go out to play. At 10.45 we come in and write down our spellings and tables which we have to learn for a test on Friday.
